statement.p: In 62.07 of the last 29 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{29}}={0.6207}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{29}. \displaystyle{P}={0.6207}\cdot{29}={18.0003}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 29-18.0003=10.9997 We round that as requested to 11.
